          <title>
            <string language="en">Properties of metals</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eigenschaften der Metalle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Propriétés des métaux</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Propriedades dos metais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Proprietà dei metalli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιδιότητες των μετάλλων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Características de metales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Third of a series of five illustrations showing two different metal rods with fixed pins, that are resting on a tripod, and are heated with a Bunsen burner.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">apparatus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Bunsen burner</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">melting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pins</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">rods</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">tripod</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wax</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Third einer Reihe von fünf Abbildungen, die zwei
unterschiedliche Metallstangen mit örtlich festgelegten Stiften 
zeigen, der stehen auf einem Stativ still und werden mit einem 
Bunsenbrenner erhitzt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le tiers d'une série de cinq illustrations 
montrant deux tiges différentes en métal avec les broches fixes, 
celle se reposent sur un trépied, et sont chauffés avec un brûleur 
de Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O third de uma série de cinco ilustrações que 
mostram duas hastes diferentes do metal com pinos fixos, aquele está 
descansando em um tripé, e é aquecido com um queimador de Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il terzo di una serie di cinque illustrazioni che
mostrano due coni retinici differenti del metallo con i perni fissi, 
quello sta riposandosi su un treppiedi ed è riscaldato con un 
bruciatore di Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το τρίτο μιας σειράς πέντε απεικονίσεων που 
εμφανίζουν δύο διαφορετικές ράβδους μετάλλων με τις σταθερές 
καρφίτσες, που στηρίζονται σε ένα τρίποδο, και θερμαίνεται με 
έναν καυστήρα Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El tercero de una serie de cinco ilustraciones que
muestran dos diversas barras del metal con los contactos fijos, de que
se está basando sobre un trípode, y se calienta con una hornilla de 
Bunsen.</string>
          </description>
